member.summary: An implementation of a proxy factory that uses a LinFu and s to create wrapped instances.

member.returns: A proxy that wraps the instance.

member.name: T:Ninject.Integration.LinFu.LinFuModule
member.summary: Extends the functionality of the kernel, providing a proxy factory that uses LinFu to generate dynamic proxies.

member.name: M:Ninject.Integration.LinFu.LinFuModule.BeforeLoad
